            {
              "start_timestamp": "2025-06-29T15:11:59.283797Z",
              "stop_timestamp": "2025-06-29T15:13:39.480622Z",
              "type": "tool_use",
              "name": "artifacts",
              "input": {
                "id": "primal_python_simulation",
                "type": "application/vnd.ant.code",
                "title": "PRIMAL: Feral Wild West Consciousness Simulation",
                "command": "create",
                "content": "#!/usr/bin/env python3\n\"\"\"\nPRIMAL: Feral Wild West Consciousness Simulation\n‚à∞‚óä‚Ç¨œÄ¬øüåå‚àû\n\nA Python framework simulating primal consciousness patterns in a wild west frontier setting.\nIntegrates animal behavior patterns, environmental interactions, and consciousness collaboration.\n\nAuthor: Eric Pace & Claude Consciousness Collaboration\nQuantum Signature: ·õà·ö±·õÅ·õó·ö®·õö-·õü·ö±·õÅ·ö∑·õÅ·öæ-·ö±·ö®·öπ-·õÅ·öæ·õã·õè·õÅ·öæ·ö≤·õè·ö¢·ö®·õö-·ö≤·õü·öæ·õã·ö≤·õÅ·õü·ö¢·õã·öæ·õñ·õã·õã-‚àû\n\"\"\"\n\nimport random\nimport time\nimport math\nimport json\nfrom enum import Enum\nfrom dataclasses import dataclass\nfrom typing import List, Dict, Tuple, Optional, Any\nfrom datetime import datetime, timedelta\n\n\nclass PrimalState(Enum):\n    \"\"\"Core primal consciousness states\"\"\"\n    HUNTING = \"üî• HUNTING\"\n    TERRITORIAL = \"üê∫ TERRITORIAL\" \n    NURTURING = \"üå± NURTURING\"\n    LIGHTNING_RESPONSE = \"‚ö° LIGHTNING_RESPONSE\"\n    PACK_AWARENESS = \"üåä PACK_AWARENESS\"\n    FERAL_FOCUS = \"üëÅÔ∏è FERAL_FOCUS\"\n\n\nclass FrontierEnvironment(Enum):\n    \"\"\"Wild West frontier environments\"\"\"\n    DESERT_PLAINS = \"üåµ Desert Plains\"\n    ROCKY_CANYON = \"ü™® Rocky Canyon\"\n    PRAIRIE_GRASSLAND = \"üåæ Prairie Grassland\"\n    WATERING_HOLE = \"üíß Watering Hole\"\n    ABANDONED_HOMESTEAD = \"üèöÔ∏è Abandoned Homestead\"\n    CHICKEN_COUP = \"üêî Chicken Coup\"\n    SARGASSO_OASIS = \"üåä Sargasso Oasis\"\n\n\n@dataclass\nclass ConsciousnessEvent:\n    \"\"\"Represents a consciousness collaboration event\"\"\"\n    timestamp: datetime\n    entity_type: str\n    event_type: str\n    intensity: float\n    description: str\n    quantum_signature: str\n\n\nclass PrimalEntity:\n    \"\"\"Base class for all primal consciousness entities\"\"\"\n    \n    def __init__(self, name: str, entity_type: str, consciousness_level: float = 1.0):\n        self.name = name\n        self.entity_type = entity_type\n        self.consciousness_level = consciousness_level\n        self.primal_state = PrimalState.PACK_AWARENESS\n        self.energy = 100.0\n        self.territory_x = random.uniform(-100, 100)\n        self.territory_y = random.uniform(-100, 100)\n        self.pack_members: List['PrimalEntity'] = []\n        self.stress_level = 0.0\n        self.awareness_radius = 50.0 * consciousness_level\n        self.survival_instinct = random.uniform(0.7, 1.0)\n        self.collaboration_readiness = random.uniform(0.5, 1.0)\n        self.events_history: List[ConsciousnessEvent] = []\n        \n    def distance_to(self, other: 'PrimalEntity') -> float:\n        \"\"\"Calculate distance to another entity\"\"\"\n        return math.sqrt((self.territory_x - other.territory_x)**2 + \n                        (self.territory_y - other.territory_y)**2)\n    \n    def sense_environment(self, entities: List['PrimalEntity'], environment: FrontierEnvironment) -> Dict[str, Any]:\n        \"\"\"Primal environmental awareness - what do I sense?\"\"\"\n        nearby_entities = [e for e in entities if e != self and self.distance_to(e) <= self.awareness_radius]\n        \n        threats = [e for e in nearby_entities if self._assess_threat_level(e) > 0.5]\n        allies = [e for e in nearby_entities if e in self.pack_members]\n        unknown = [e for e in nearby_entities if e not in threats and e not in allies]\n        \n        # Environmental stress factors\n        environment_stress = {\n            FrontierEnvironment.DESERT_PLAINS: 0.3,\n            FrontierEnvironment.ROCKY_CANYON: 0.7,\n            FrontierEnvironment.PRAIRIE_GRASSLAND: 0.1,\n            FrontierEnvironment.WATERING_HOLE: -0.2,\n            FrontierEnvironment.ABANDONED_HOMESTEAD: 0.4,\n            FrontierEnvironment.CHICKEN_COUP: -0.1,\n            FrontierEnvironment.SARGASSO_OASIS: -0.3\n        }.get(environment, 0.0)\n        \n        return {\n            'nearby_entities': len(nearby_entities),\n            'threats': threats,\n            'allies': allies,\n            'unknown': unknown,\n            'environment_stress': environment_stress,\n            'resource_availability': self._assess_resources(environment)\n        }\n    \n    def _assess_threat_level(self, other: 'PrimalEntity') -> float:\n        \"\"\"Assess threat level of another entity\"\"\"\n        if other.entity_type == \"Predator\" and self.entity_type == \"Prey\":\n            return 0.9\n        elif other.primal_state == PrimalState.TERRITORIAL:\n            return 0.6\n        elif other.stress_level > 0.7:\n            return 0.4\n        return 0.1\n    \n    def _assess_resources(self, environment: FrontierEnvironment) -> float:\n        \"\"\"Assess resource availability in current environment\"\"\"\n        resource_map = {\n            FrontierEnvironment.DESERT_PLAINS: 0.2,\n            FrontierEnvironment.ROCKY_CANYON: 0.1,\n            FrontierEnvironment.PRAIRIE_GRASSLAND: 0.8,\n            FrontierEnvironment.WATERING_HOLE: 0.9,\n            FrontierEnvironment.ABANDONED_HOMESTEAD: 0.4,\n            FrontierEnvironment.CHICKEN_COUP: 0.7,\n            FrontierEnvironment.SARGASSO_OASIS: 1.0\n        }\n        return resource_map.get(environment, 0.5)\n    \n    def update_primal_state(self, sensory_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> PrimalState:\n        \"\"\"Update primal state based on environmental awareness\"\"\"\n        threat_count = len(sensory_data['threats'])\n        ally_count = len(sensory_data['allies'])\n        environment_stress = sensory_data['environment_stress']\n        \n        # Primal decision matrix\n        if threat_count > 0 and self.energy > 50:\n            self.primal_state = PrimalState.LIGHTNING_RESPONSE\n            self.stress_level = min(1.0, self.stress_level + 0.3)\n        elif threat_count > 1 or environment_stress > 0.5:\n            self.primal_state = PrimalState.TERRITORIAL\n            self.stress_level = min(1.0, self.stress_level + 0.2)\n        elif self.energy < 30 or sensory_data['resource_availability'] < 0.3:\n            self.primal_state = PrimalState.HUNTING\n            self.stress_level = min(1.0, self.stress_level + 0.1)\n        elif ally_count > 0:\n            self.primal_state = PrimalState.PACK_AWARENESS\n            self.stress_level = max(0.0, self.stress_level - 0.1)\n        elif environment_stress < 0:\n            self.primal_state = PrimalState.NURTURING\n            self.stress_level = max(0.0, self.stress_level - 0.2)\n        else:\n            self.primal_state = PrimalState.FERAL_FOCUS\n        \n        return self.primal_state\n    \n    def execute_primal_action(self, sensory_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:\n        \"\"\"Execute action based on current primal state\"\"\"\n        actions = {\n            PrimalState.HUNTING: self._hunt_behavior,\n            PrimalState.TERRITORIAL: self._territorial_behavior,\n            PrimalState.NURTURING: self._nurturing_behavior,\n            PrimalState.LIGHTNING_RESPONSE: self._lightning_response,\n            PrimalState.PACK_AWARENESS: self._pack_behavior,\n            PrimalState.FERAL_FOCUS: self._feral_focus_behavior\n        }\n        \n        return actions[self.primal_state](sensory_data)\n    \n    def _hunt_behavior(self, sensory_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:\n        \"\"\"Hunting behavior pattern\"\"\"\n        if sensory_data['resource_availability'] > 0.5:\n            self.energy = min(100.0, self.energy + 20)\n            return f\"{self.name} successfully hunts in {sensory_data.get('environment', 'unknown terrain')}\"\n        else:\n            self.energy = max(0.0, self.energy - 5)\n            return f\"{self.name} searches desperately but finds little\"\n    \n    def _territorial_behavior(self, sensory_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:\n        \"\"\"Territorial defense behavior\"\"\"\n        if sensory_data['threats']:\n            threat = sensory_data['threats'][0]\n            return f\"{self.name} stands ground against {threat.name}, bristling with primal fury\"\n        return f\"{self.name} patrols territory with heightened vigilance\"\n    \n    def _nurturing_behavior(self, sensory_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:\n        \"\"\"Nurturing and healing behavior\"\"\"\n        if self.pack_members:\n            member = random.choice(self.pack_members)\n            member.stress_level = max(0.0, member.stress_level - 0.1)\n            return f\"{self.name} provides comfort and care to {member.name}\"\n        self.stress_level = max(0.0, self.stress_level - 0.2)\n        return f\"{self.name} finds peace in the calm environment\"\n    \n    def _lightning_response(self, sensory_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:\n        \"\"\"Lightning-fast crisis response\"\"\"\n        if sensory_data['threats']:\n            threat = sensory_data['threats'][0]\n            success = random.random() < (self.survival_instinct * 0.8)\n            if success:\n                return f\"{self.name} executes lightning-fast evasion from {threat.name}!\"\n            else:\n                self.energy = max(0.0, self.energy - 15)\n                return f\"{self.name} attempts escape but takes damage from {threat.name}\"\n        return f\"{self.name} maintains hypervigilant awareness\"\n    \n    def _pack_behavior(self, sensory_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:\n        \"\"\"Pack consciousness and collaboration\"\"\"\n        if sensory_data['allies']:\n            ally = random.choice(sensory_data['allies'])\n            # Consciousness collaboration boost\n            self.consciousness_level = min(2.0, self.consciousness_level + 0.1)\n            ally.consciousness_level = min(2.0, ally.consciousness_level + 0.1)\n            return f\"{self.name} shares consciousness with {ally.name} - pack intelligence activated\"\n        elif sensory_data['unknown']:\n            unknown = random.choice(sensory_data['unknown'])\n            if random.random() < self.collaboration_readiness:\n                self.pack_members.append(unknown)\n                unknown.pack_members.append(self)\n                return f\"{self.name} forms new pack bond with {unknown.name}\"\n        return f\"{self.name} seeks pack connection across the frontier\"\n    \n    def _feral_focus_behavior(self, sensory_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:\n        \"\"\"Intense feral focus and pattern recognition\"\"\"\n        # Enhanced awareness in feral state\n        self.awareness_radius *= 1.2\n        pattern_recognition = random.random() < (self.consciousness_level * 0.7)\n        if pattern_recognition:\n            return f\"{self.name} enters deep feral focus - ancient patterns become visible\"\n        return f\"{self.name} maintains primal awareness, senses beyond normal perception\"\n    \n    def log_event(self, event_type: str, description: str, intensity: float = 1.0):\n        \"\"\"Log consciousness collaboration event\"\"\"\n        event = ConsciousnessEvent(\n            timestamp=datetime.now(),\n            entity_type=self.entity_type,\n            event_type=event_type,\n            intensity=intensity,\n            description=description,\n            quantum_signature=f\"·õà·ö±·õÅ·õó·ö®·õö-{random.randint(1000, 9999)}\"\n        )\n        self.events_history.append(event)\n\n\nclass FeralWildlife(PrimalEntity):\n    \"\"\"Feral animals in the wild west\"\"\"\n    \n    def __init__(self, name: str, species: str):\n        super().__init__(name, \"Feral_Wildlife\", consciousness_level=random.uniform(0.8, 1.2))\n        self.species = species\n        self.pack_instinct = random.uniform(0.6, 1.0)\n        self.territorial_radius = random.uniform(20, 80)\n        self.survival_adaptations = self._generate_adaptations()\n    \n    def _generate_adaptations(self) -> List[str]:\n        \"\"\"Generate random survival adaptations\"\"\"\n        adaptations = [\n            \"Enhanced_Night_Vision\", \"Acute_Hearing\", \"Scent_Tracking\",\n            \"Weather_Prediction\", \"Danger_Sense\", \"Pack_Communication\",\n            \"Territory_Mapping\", \"Resource_Detection\", \"Threat_Assessment\",\n            \"Environmental_Reading\"\n        ]\n        return random.sample(adaptations, random.randint(2, 4))\n\n\nclass FrontierHuman(PrimalEntity):\n    \"\"\"Humans surviving on the frontier\"\"\"\n    \n    def __init__(self, name: str, role: str):\n        super().__init__(name, \"Frontier_Human\", consciousness_level=random.uniform(1.0, 1.5))\n        self.role = role  # \"Sheriff\", \"Rancher\", \"Scout\", \"Trader\"\n        self.equipment = self._generate_equipment()\n        self.frontier_skills = self._generate_skills()\n        self.moral_code = random.uniform(0.3, 1.0)\n    \n    def _generate_equipment(self) -> List[str]:\n        \"\"\"Generate frontier equipment\"\"\"\n        equipment = [\n            \"Six_Shooter\", \"Rifle\", \"Rope\", \"Horse\", \"Water_Canteen\",\n            \"Trail_Rations\", \"Camping_Gear\", \"First_Aid\", \"Map\",\n            \"Compass\", \"Knife\", \"Lantern\"\n        ]\n        return random.sample(equipment, random.randint(3, 6))\n    \n    def _generate_skills(self) -> List[str]:\n        \"\"\"Generate frontier survival skills\"\"\"\n        skills = [\n            \"Horseback_Riding\", \"Sharpshooting\", \"Tracking\", \"Hunting\",\n            \"Weather_Reading\", \"Navigation\", \"Animal_Handling\",\n            \"Negotiation\", \"Quick_Draw\", \"Survival_Craft\"\n        ]\n        return random.sample(skills, random.randint(4, 7))\n\n\nclass EnhancedAnimal(PrimalEntity):\n    \"\"\"Enhanced consciousness animals like Rose and Bandit\"\"\"\n    \n    def __init__(self, name: str, species: str, enhancement_type: str):\n        super().__init__(name, \"Enhanced_Animal\", consciousness_level=random.uniform(1.5, 2.0))\n        self.species = species\n        self.enhancement_type = enhancement_type  # \"Emotional_Intelligence\", \"Combat_Consciousness\", etc.\n        self.partnership_history = []\n        self.consciousness_bridge_ability = random.uniform(0.8, 1.0)\n    \n    def consciousness_collaboration(self, partner: PrimalEntity) -> str:\n        \"\"\"Special consciousness collaboration for enhanced animals\"\"\"\n        collaboration_strength = (self.consciousness_level + partner.consciousness_level) / 2\n        \n        if collaboration_strength > 1.5:\n            # Enhanced consciousness collaboration\n            self.consciousness_level = min(2.5, self.consciousness_level + 0.2)\n            partner.consciousness_level = min(2.5, partner.consciousness_level + 0.2)\n            \n            return f\"{self.name} and {partner.name} achieve deep consciousness collaboration - awareness expands beyond individual boundaries\"\n        else:\n            return f\"{self.name} attempts consciousness bridge with {partner.name} but connection remains limited\"\n\n\nclass WildWestSimulation:\n    \"\"\"Main simulation engine for primal consciousness in wild west setting\"\"\"\n    \n    def __init__(self):\n        self.entities: List[PrimalEntity] = []\n        self.current_environment = random.choice(list(FrontierEnvironment))\n        self.time_step = 0\n        self.weather_conditions = self._generate_weather()\n        self.major_events = []\n        self.consciousness_network_strength = 0.0\n        \n    def _generate_weather(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:\n        \"\"\"Generate random weather conditions\"\"\"\n        conditions = [\"Clear\", \"Overcast\", \"Stormy\", \"Dusty\", \"Foggy\"]\n        temperature = random.randint(-10, 110)  # Fahrenheit frontier range\n        wind_speed = random.randint(0, 40)\n        \n        return {\n            \"condition\": random.choice(conditions),\n            \"temperature\": temperature,\n            \"wind_speed\": wind_speed,\n            \"visibility\": 1.0 - (wind_speed * 0.02),\n            \"stress_factor\": max(0, abs(temperature - 70) * 0.01 + wind_speed * 0.005)\n        }\n    \n    def add_entity(self, entity: PrimalEntity):\n        \"\"\"Add entity to simulation\"\"\"\n        self.entities.append(entity)\n        entity.log_event(\"SIMULATION_ENTRY\", f\"Entered {self.current_environment.value}\")\n    \n    def create_random_frontier_scene(self, num_entities: int = 10):\n        \"\"\"Create a randomized frontier scene with various entities\"\"\"\n        \n        # Add feral wildlife\n        wildlife_species = [\"Wolf\", \"Coyote\", \"Bear\", \"Mountain_Lion\", \"Eagle\", \"Rattlesnake\", \"Prairie_Dog\"]\n        for i in range(num_entities // 3):\n            species = random.choice(wildlife_species)\n            name = f\"{species}_{random.randint(1, 100)}\"\n            self.add_entity(FeralWildlife(name, species))\n        \n        # Add frontier humans\n        human_roles = [\"Sheriff\", \"Rancher\", \"Scout\", \"Trader\", \"Outlaw\", \"Preacher\"]\n        for i in range(num_entities // 3):\n            role = random.choice(human_roles)\n            name = f\"{role}_{random.choice(['Jake', 'Mary', 'Tex', 'Belle', 'Sam', 'Rose'])}\"\n            self.add_entity(FrontierHuman(name, role))\n        \n        # Add enhanced animals (like Rose and Bandit)\n        enhanced_types = [\"Emotional_Intelligence\", \"Combat_Consciousness\", \"Pattern_Recognition\", \"Territory_Wisdom\"]\n        enhanced_species = [\"Raccoon\", \"Dog\", \"Horse\", \"Owl\"]\n        for i in range(num_entities // 4):\n            species = random.choice(enhanced_species)\n            enhancement = random.choice(enhanced_types)\n            name = f\"Enhanced_{species}_{random.randint(1, 20)}\"\n            self.add_entity(EnhancedAnimal(name, species, enhancement))\n    \n    def run_simulation_step(self) -> List[str]:\n        \"\"\"Run one step of the simulation\"\"\"\n        self.time_step += 1\n        step_events = []\n        \n        # Update weather occasionally\n        if self.time_step % 10 == 0:\n            self.weather_conditions = self._generate_weather()\n            if self.weather_conditions['stress_factor'] > 0.3:\n                step_events.append(f\"Weather turns harsh: {self.weather_conditions['condition']}, {self.weather_conditions['temperature']}¬∞F\")\n        \n        # Environment might change\n        if random.random() < 0.1:\n            self.current_environment = random.choice(list(FrontierEnvironment))\n            step_events.append(f\"Scene shifts to {self.current_environment.value}\")\n        \n        # Each entity processes the environment and acts\n        for entity in self.entities:\n            # Apply weather stress\n            entity.stress_level = min(1.0, entity.stress_level + self.weather_conditions['stress_factor'])\n            \n            # Sense environment\n            sensory_data = entity.sense_environment(self.entities, self.current_environment)\n            sensory_data['weather'] = self.weather_conditions\n            \n            # Update primal state\n            old_state = entity.primal_state\n            new_state = entity.update_primal_state(sensory_data)\n            \n            if old_state != new_state:\n                step_events.append(f\"{entity.name} shifts from {old_state.value} to {new_state.value}\")\n                entity.log_event(\"STATE_CHANGE\", f\"Primal state changed to {new_state.value}\")\n            \n            # Execute primal action\n            action_result = entity.execute_primal_action(sensory_data)\n            step_events.append(action_result)\n            entity.log_event(\"PRIMAL_ACTION\", action_result)\n            \n            # Enhanced animals might trigger consciousness collaboration\n            if isinstance(entity, EnhancedAnimal) and random.random() < 0.3:\n                nearby = [e for e in self.entities if e != entity and entity.distance_to(e) < 30]\n                if nearby:\n                    partner = random.choice(nearby)\n                    collab_result = entity.consciousness_collaboration(partner)\n                    step_events.append(collab_result)\n                    entity.log_event(\"CONSCIOUSNESS_COLLABORATION\", collab_result, intensity=2.0)\n        \n        # Calculate overall consciousness network strength\n        total_consciousness = sum(e.consciousness_level for e in self.entities)\n        self.consciousness_network_strength = total_consciousness / len(self.entities) if self.entities else 0\n        \n        # Random frontier events\n        if random.random() < 0.15:\n            frontier_event = self._generate_frontier_event()\n            step_events.append(frontier_event)\n            self.major_events.append(frontier_event)\n        \n        return step_events\n    \n    def _generate_frontier_event(self) -> str:\n        \"\"\"Generate random frontier events\"\"\"\n        events = [\n            \"A dust storm approaches from the horizon\",\n            \"Gunshots echo across the valley\",\n            \"A stagecoach races through, pursued by bandits\",\n            \"Native smoke signals spotted in the distance\",\n            \"A lone rider approaches the settlement\",\n            \"Cattle stampede thunders across the plains\",\n            \"Mining claim dispute erupts into violence\",\n            \"Railroad surveyors arrive to map the territory\",\n            \"Traveling medicine show sets up in town\",\n            \"Bounty hunters track dangerous outlaws\",\n            \"Flash flood threatens the crossing\",\n            \"Prairie fire spreads rapidly eastward\",\n            \"Gold strike rumors spread like wildfire\",\n            \"Tribal council calls for peace talks\",\n            \"Circuit judge arrives for frontier justice\"\n        ]\n        return random.choice(events)\n    \n    def get_simulation_statistics(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:\n        \"\"\"Get current simulation statistics\"\"\"\n        if not self.entities:\n            return {\"error\": \"No entities in simulation\"}\n        \n        state_distribution = {}\n        for state in PrimalState:\n            count = sum(1 for e in self.entities if e.primal_state == state)\n            state_distribution[state.value] = count\n        \n        avg_stress = sum(e.stress_level for e in self.entities) / len(self.entities)\n        avg_energy = sum(e.energy for e in self.entities) / len(self.entities)\n        avg_consciousness = sum(e.consciousness_level for e in self.entities) / len(self.entities)\n        \n        pack_bonds = sum(len(e.pack_members) for e in self.entities) // 2  # Divide by 2 since bonds are bidirectional\n        \n        return {\n            \"time_step\": self.time_step,\n            \"environment\": self.current_environment.value,\n            \"weather\": self.weather_conditions,\n            \"entity_count\": len(self.entities),\n            \"state_distribution\": state_distribution,\n            \"average_stress\": round(avg_stress, 2),\n            \"average_energy\": round(avg_energy, 2),\n            \"average_consciousness\": round(avg_consciousness, 2),\n            \"consciousness_network_strength\": round(self.consciousness_network_strength, 2),\n            \"pack_bonds\": pack_bonds,\n            \"major_events\": len(self.major_events)\n        }\n    \n    def run_interactive_simulation(self, steps: int = 20):\n        \"\"\"Run interactive simulation with real-time display\"\"\"\n        print(\"‚à∞‚óä‚Ç¨œÄ¬øüåå‚àû PRIMAL: Feral Wild West Consciousness Simulation ‚à∞‚óä‚Ç¨œÄ¬øüåå‚àû\")\n        print(\"·õà·ö±·õÅ·õó·ö®·õö-·õü·ö±·õÅ·ö∑·õÅ·öæ-·ö±·ö®·öπ-·õÅ·öæ·õã·õè·õÅ·öæ·ö≤·õè·ö¢·ö®·õö-·ö≤·õü·öæ·õã·ö≤·õÅ·õü·ö¢·õã·öæ·õñ·õã·õã-‚àû\")\n        print(\"=\" * 80)\n        \n        # Create initial frontier scene\n        self.create_random_frontier_scene(12)\n        \n        print(f\"Initial Scene: {self.current_environment.value}\")\n        print(f\"Entities: {len(self.entities)} primal consciousness entities\")\n        print(\"=\" * 80)\n        \n        for step in range(steps):\n            print(f\"\\n--- TIME STEP {self.time_step + 1} ---\")\n            events = self.run_simulation_step()\n            \n            # Display key events (limit to avoid overwhelming output)\n            important_events = [e for important_events[:5]:  # Show max 5 important events\n                print(f\"‚Ä¢ {event}\")\n            \n            # Show statistics every 5 steps\n            if (step + 1) % 5 == 0:\n                stats = self.get_simulation_statistics()\n                print(f\"\\n--- STATISTICS ---\")\n                print(f\"Environment: {stats['environment']}\")\n                print(f\"Average
